one_reviews_text: This is a pretty fun game.

I wanted to give this game 5 stars but i just couldn't.

First off let me say i had a lot of fun playing this game but i beat it in about an hour.  There arn't a lot of different games to use and it was kinda easy, But does have some replay value (arcade style trying to beat your previous score.)  

For 10$ I would have given 5 stars.

verry fun vr game 
but its to short

Fantastic game with something for everyone from the beginners to the hardcore players.

Bear in mind.. its Addictive!
This is a lot of fun and can get tough at times. The jokes are very well done and the shooting feels natural.
